NutritionFormulas.subType: Basis Metabolische Snelheid (BMS) & Totaal Dagelijks Energieverbruik (TDEV)

formules.naam: Basis Metabolische Snelheid (BMS) - Mifflin-St Jeor Formule
formules.beschrijving: Schat het aantal calorieën dat het lichaam in rust verbrandt om basale fysiologische functies te onderhouden. Dit is de 'minimale' energiebehoefte voor overleving.
formules.formule: Voor Mannen: $$BMS = (10 \times Gewicht_{kg}) + (6.25 \times Lengte_{cm}) - (5 \times Leeftijd_{jaren}) + 5$$ Voor Vrouwen: $$BMS = (10 \times Gewicht_{kg}) + (6.25 \times Lengte_{cm}) - (5 \times Leeftijd_{jaren}) - 161$$
formules.notities: Wordt beschouwd als een van de meest nauwkeurige voorspellende vergelijkingen voor BMS. Andere formules bestaan (bijv. Harris-Benedict). Dit vertegenwoordigt de 'minimale' caloriebehoefte in rust.

formules.beschrijving: Schat het totale aantal calorieën dat op een dag wordt verbrand, inclusief BMS en fysieke activiteit. Dit kan de 'maximale' energiebehoefte vertegenwoordigen, afhankelijk van het activiteitsniveau.

variabelen.beschrijving: Vermenigvuldigingsfactor gebaseerd op activiteitsniveau (bijv. Zittend: 1.2, Licht actief: 1.375, Matig actief: 1.55, Zeer actief: 1.725, Extra actief: 1.9)

formules.notities: Wordt gebruikt om de calorie-inname te bepalen voor gewichtsbehoud, -verlies of -toename.

formules.beschrijving: Het verschil tussen de geconsumeerde en verbruikte calorieën, wat de gewichtsverandering bepaalt. Een 'tekort' is een negatieve waarde, een 'overschot' is positief.
formules.notities: Een tekort leidt tot gewichtsverlies, een overschot tot gewichtstoename. Ongeveer 7700 calorieën = 1 kg lichaamsvet.

NutritionFormulas.subType: Verdeling van Eiwitten, Koolhydraten en Vetten

formules.beschrijving: Berekent de doelgrammen van een specifiek macronutriënt op basis van de totale calorie-inname en het gewenste percentage. Kan worden gebruikt om 'minimale' of 'maximale' inname voor specifieke doelen te bepalen.

variabelen.beschrijving: Gewenst percentage calorieën van dat macronutriënt (bijv. 0.30 voor 30%)
Calorische waarde per gram (Eiwit: 4 kcal/g, Koolhydraten: 4 kcal/g, Vet: 9 kcal/g)

formules.notities: Gebruikt voor nauwkeurige dieetplanning om fitnessdoelen te ondersteunen. Bijvoorbeeld, een 'minimale' eiwitinname kan 0.8g/kg lichaamsgewicht zijn, terwijl een 'maximale' 2.2g/kg of meer kan zijn voor spiergroei.

formules.beschrijving: Berekent de aanbevolen dagelijkse eiwitinname op basis van lichaamsgewicht, vaak uitgedrukt in grammen per kilogram lichaamsgewicht.

variabelen.beschrijving: Aanbevolen eiwit per kg lichaamsgewicht (bijv. 0.8 voor algemeen, 1.6-2.2 voor sporters)

formules.notities: De eiwitfactor varieert sterk afhankelijk van activiteitsniveau, leeftijd en doelen (bijv. spiergroei, gewichtsverlies).

formules.beschrijving: Berekent de aanbevolen dagelijkse koolhydraatinname op basis van lichaamsgewicht, vaak uitgedrukt in grammen per kilogram lichaamsgewicht, vooral voor sporters.

variabelen.beschrijving: Aanbevolen koolhydraat per kg lichaamsgewicht (bijv. 3-10 voor sporters, afhankelijk van intensiteit)

formules.notities: De behoefte aan koolhydraten is sterk afhankelijk van de trainingsintensiteit en duur. Hogere factoren voor duursporters.

formules.beschrijving: Berekent de aanbevolen dagelijkse vetinname op basis van lichaamsgewicht, vaak uitgedrukt in grammen per kilogram lichaamsgewicht.
formules.notities: Vetinname is cruciaal voor hormoonproductie en algehele gezondheid. Vaak uitgedrukt als een percentage van de totale calorieën (bijv. 20-35%).

formules.naam: Aanbevolen Dagelijkse Hoeveelheden (ADH) / Dietary Reference Intakes (DRIs)
formules.beschrijving: Vastgestelde waarden voor de inname van vitaminen en mineralen om tekorten te voorkomen en optimale gezondheid te ondersteunen. Dit zijn 'minimale' tot 'optimale' innamehoeveelheden.
formules.formule: Geen specifieke formule; dit zijn vastgestelde referentiewaarden per nutriënt, variërend per leeftijd, geslacht, zwangerschap/lactatie, en activiteitsniveau.

variabelen.beschrijving: Specifieke vitamine of mineraal (bijv. Vitamine C, IJzer, Calcium)

formules.notities: Deze waarden worden gepubliceerd door nationale en internationale gezondheidsorganisaties (bijv. Gezondheidsraad in Nederland, USDA in VS). Overschrijding van de 'maximale' toelaatbare inname (Tolerable Upper Intake Levels - ULs) kan toxiciteit veroorzaken.

formules.beschrijving: Een maat voor de hoeveelheid nutriënten per calorie in een voedingsmiddel, om voedingsmiddelen te identificeren die veel nutriënten leveren met relatief weinig calorieën.

variabelen.beschrijving: Percentage van de aanbevolen dagelijkse hoeveelheid van een specifiek nutriënt in een portie

formules.notities: Hogere scores duiden op een hogere nutriëntdichtheid. Helpt bij het kiezen van voedingsmiddelen die 'maximaal' nutriënten leveren voor 'minimale' calorieën.

formules.beschrijving: De procentuele verdeling van calorieën over eiwitten, koolhydraten en vetten in een dieetplan.
formules.notities: Gangbare verhoudingen variëren sterk (bijv. 30/40/30 voor gebalanceerd, 20/50/30 voor duursporters, 40/30/30 voor gewichtsverlies/spierbehoud). Dit is een 'maximale' of 'minimale' focus op bepaalde macronutriënten.

formules.beschrijving: De Glycemische Index (GI) meet hoe snel koolhydraten in een voedingsmiddel de bloedsuikerspiegel verhogen. De Glycemische Lading (GL) houdt rekening met zowel de GI als de portiegrootte.
formules.notities: Lage GI/GL voedingsmiddelen zorgen voor een stabielere bloedsuikerspiegel. Belangrijk voor diabetesmanagement en duurprestaties. De 'minimale' of 'maximale' impact op de bloedsuikerspiegel.

formules.beschrijving: De aanbevolen dagelijkse inname van vezels voor darmgezondheid en verzadiging.
formules.formule: Geen specifieke formule; aanbevelingen zijn vaak in grammen per dag (bijv. 25-30g/dag voor volwassenen).
formules.notities: Een 'minimale' inname is cruciaal voor gezondheid, terwijl een 'maximale' inname (te veel) spijsverteringsproblemen kan veroorzaken.

formules.beschrijving: Een subjectieve, maar veelgebruikte methode om de hydratatiestatus te beoordelen op basis van de kleur van de urine. Donkere urine duidt op 'minimale' hydratatie.
formules.notities: Lichtere kleuren (1-3) duiden op goede hydratatie, donkere kleuren (4+) op uitdroging. Dit is een snelle visuele indicator, geen analytische formule.

formules.beschrijving: Schatting van de dagelijkse waterbehoefte, afhankelijk van lichaamsgewicht en activiteitsniveau.
formules.formule: $$Waterbehoefte (L) = Lichaamsgewicht (kg) \times 0.03$$ (basisrichtlijn) + extra voor activiteit en omgevingsfactoren
formules.notities: Dit is een basisrichtlijn; individuele behoeften variëren sterk. Sporters en mensen in warme klimaten hebben een 'maximale' behoefte.

formules.description: Essentieel voor spiergroei en -herstel, enzymen, hormonen en immuunfunctie.
formules.relevance_human_algorithm: De 'bouwstenen' voor algoritme-ontwikkeling en -onderhoud; essentieel voor de integriteit en reparatie van het systeem, en de constructie van nieuwe modules.

formules.description: Primaire energiebron voor het lichaam en de hersenen.

recommendations.high_intensity_exercise: 5-10 gram per kg lichaamsgewicht (afhankelijk van duur en intensiteit)

formules.relevance_human_algorithm: De 'brandstof' voor computationele processen; de primaire energiebron voor het uitvoeren van instructies en het verwerken van data.

formules.description: Essentieel voor hormoonproductie, vitamine-absorptie, celmembranen en energiereserves.
formules.relevance_human_algorithm: De 'lange-termijn opslag' en 'structurele componenten' van het algoritme; cruciaal voor stabiliteit, communicatie tussen modules en reserve-energie.

formules.description: Organische verbindingen nodig in kleine hoeveelheden voor diverse lichaamsfuncties.
formules.relevance_human_algorithm: De 'co-factoren' of 'configuratieparameters' die kleine, maar cruciale, aanpassingen mogelijk maken voor de optimale werking van specifieke subroutines of modules.

formules.description: Anorganische elementen nodig voor botten, tanden, zenuwfunctie, vloeistofbalans, etc.
formules.relevance_human_algorithm: De 'essentiële bibliotheken' of 'frameworks' die de fundamentele functionaliteit van het algoritme ondersteunen, van data-overdracht tot structurele integriteit.

formules.description: Data over de precieze voedingswaarde van duizenden voedingsmiddelen.
formules.relevance_human_algorithm: De 'referentietabellen' en 'lookup-tabellen' die het algoritme gebruikt om contextuele informatie over zijn 'inputs' (voeding) te begrijpen.

formules.description: Referentiewaarden voor voedingsstoffen voor gezonde populaties.
categories: Aanbevolen Dagelijkse Hoeveelheid (ADH): Gemiddelde dagelijkse inname die voldoende is voor bijna alle gezonde individuen.
Adequate Inname (AI): Gebruikt wanneer ADH niet kan worden vastgesteld, gebaseerd op waarnemingen van gezonde mensen.
Tolerable Upper Intake Level (UL): Maximale dagelijkse inname die waarschijnlijk geen nadelige gezondheidseffecten veroorzaakt.
formules.relevance_human_algorithm: De 'veiligheidsprotocollen' en 'optimale configuratielimieten' voor de input van het algoritme, om zowel functionaliteit als 'gezondheid' te garanderen.

precisie_score.name: Displacement
precisie_score.description: The shortest distance from the initial to the final position of a point.

precisie_score.name: Velocity (Average)
precisie_score.description: The rate at which an object changes its position.

precisie_score.name: Acceleration (Average)
precisie_score.description: The rate at which an object changes its velocity.

precisie_score.name: Newton's Second Law of Motion
precisie_score.description: The acceleration of an object is directly proportional to the net force acting on it and inversely proportional to its mass.

precisie_score.name: Weight
precisie_score.description: The force exerted on an object due to gravity.

precisie_score.name: Kinetic Energy
precisie_score.description: The energy possessed by an object due to its motion.

precisie_score.name: Gravitational Potential Energy
precisie_score.description: The energy an object possesses due to its position in a gravitational field.

precisie_score.name: Work Done by a Constant Force
precisie_score.description: The energy transferred to or from an object by a force acting over a displacement.

precisie_score.name: Power
precisie_score.description: The rate at which work is done or energy is transferred.

precisie_score.name: Momentum
precisie_score.description: A measure of the mass in motion of an object.

precisie_score.name: Impulse
precisie_score.description: The change in momentum of an object.

precisie_score.name: Density
precisie_score.description: Mass per unit volume of a substance.

precisie_score.name: Pressure
precisie_score.description: Force applied perpendicular to the surface of an object per unit area over which that force is distributed.

precisie_score.name: Hooke's Law (Spring Force)
precisie_score.description: The force required to extend or compress a spring is directly proportional to the distance of that extension or compression.

precisie_score.name: Period of a Simple Pendulum
precisie_score.description: The time taken for one complete oscillation of a simple pendulum.

precisie_score.name: Frequency
precisie_score.description: The number of cycles or oscillations per unit time.

precisie_score.name: Wave Speed
precisie_score.description: The speed at which a wave travels through a medium.

precisie_score.name: Ohm's Law
precisie_score.description: The current through a conductor between two points is directly proportional to the voltage across the two points.

precisie_score.name: Electric Power
precisie_score.description: The rate at which electrical energy is transferred.

precisie_score.name: Capacitance
precisie_score.description: The ability of a system to store an electric charge.

precisie_score.name: Energy Stored in a Capacitor
precisie_score.description: The electrical potential energy stored in the electric field of a capacitor.

precisie_score.name: Heat Transfer (Conduction)
precisie_score.description: The transfer of thermal energy between objects in direct contact.

precisie_score.name: Specific Heat Capacity
precisie_score.description: The amount of heat required to raise the temperature of one unit mass of a substance by one degree Celsius or Kelvin.

precisie_score.name: Ideal Gas Law
precisie_score.description: Relates pressure, volume, temperature, and the number of moles of an ideal gas.

precisie_score.name: Refraction (Snell's Law)
precisie_score.description: Describes the relationship between the angles of incidence and refraction, when light passes through a boundary between two different isotropic media.

precisie_score.name: Lens Equation (Thin Lens)
precisie_score.description: Relates the focal length of a lens to the distances of the object and image from the lens.

precisie_score.name: Magnification (Thin Lens)
precisie_score.description: The ratio of the image height to the object height.

precisie_score.name: Doppler Effect (Sound)
precisie_score.description: The change in frequency or wavelength of a wave in relation to an observer who is moving relative to the wave source.

precisie_score.name: Sound Intensity
precisie_score.description: The power carried by sound waves per unit area in a direction perpendicular to that area.

precisie_score.name: Sound Intensity Level (Decibels)
precisie_score.description: A logarithmic measure of the sound intensity relative to a reference intensity.

precisie_score.name: Kinematic Equation 1 (Constant Acceleration)
precisie_score.description: Relates final velocity, initial velocity, acceleration, and time.

precisie_score.name: Kinematic Equation 2 (Constant Acceleration)
precisie_score.description: Relates displacement, initial velocity, final velocity, and time.

precisie_score.name: Kinematic Equation 3 (Constant Acceleration)
precisie_score.description: Relates final velocity, initial velocity, acceleration, and displacement.

precisie_score.name: Kinematic Equation 4 (Constant Acceleration)
precisie_score.description: Relates displacement, initial velocity, acceleration, and time.

precisie_score.name: Newton's First Law of Motion
precisie_score.description: An object at rest stays at rest and an object in motion stays in motion with the same speed and in the same direction unless acted upon by an unbalanced force.

precisie_score.name: Newton's Third Law of Motion
precisie_score.description: For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction.

precisie_score.name: Gravitational Force (Universal)
precisie_score.description: The attractive force between any two masses.

precisie_score.name: Elastic Potential Energy (Spring)
precisie_score.description: The energy stored in a spring when it is stretched or compressed.

precisie_score.name: Power (Force and Velocity)
precisie_score.description: The rate at which work is done by a force moving an object.

precisie_score.name: Angular Velocity
precisie_score.description: The rate of change of angular displacement.

precisie_score.name: Angular Acceleration
precisie_score.description: The rate of change of angular velocity.

precisie_score.name: Torque
precisie_score.description: A twisting force that tends to cause rotation.

precisie_score.name: Moment of Inertia (Point Mass)
precisie_score.description: A measure of an object's resistance to changes in its rotation for a point mass.

precisie_score.name: Angular Momentum
precisie_score.description: The rotational equivalent of linear momentum.

precisie_score.name: Rotational Kinetic Energy
precisie_score.description: The kinetic energy an object possesses due to its rotation.

precisie_score.description: The force exerted by a magnetic field on a current-carrying wire.

precisie_score.description: States that a time-varying magnetic field produces an electric field (induced EMF).

precisie_score.name: Work Done by Gas (Constant Pressure)
precisie_score.description: The work done by a gas expanding against a constant external pressure.

precisie_score.description: The heat change of a system at constant pressure.

precisie_score.name: Entropy Change (Reversible Process)
precisie_score.description: The change in disorder for a reversible heat flow at constant temperature.

precisie_score.description: Predicts the spontaneity of a process at constant temperature and pressure.

precisie_score.name: Wave Equation (1D)

precisie_score.description: Condition for dark fringes in a single-slit diffraction pattern.

precisie_score.description: Frequencies for standing waves on a string with fixed ends.

precisie_score.name: Stress (Normal)

precisie_score.name: Strain (Normal)
precisie_score.description: The deformation of a material in response to an applied force, expressed as the change in length per unit original length.

precisie_score.name: Young's Modulus (Modulus of Elasticity)
precisie_score.description: A measure of the stiffness of an elastic material, defined as the ratio of stress to strain.

precisie_score.description: The internal force per unit area acting parallel to a surface within a material.

precisie_score.description: A measure of the resistance to shear deformation.

precisie_score.name: Bulk Modulus

precisie_score.name: Bernoulli's Principle
precisie_score.description: States that for an incompressible, inviscid fluid in steady flow, an increase in the speed of the fluid occurs simultaneously with a decrease in pressure or a decrease in the fluid's potential energy.

precisie_score.name: Continuity Equation (Fluid Dynamics)
precisie_score.description: States that for an incompressible fluid, the mass flow rate must remain constant along a streamline.

precisie_score.name: Volumetric Flow Rate
precisie_score.description: The volume of fluid passing through a given cross-sectional area per unit time.

precisie_score.name: Reynolds Number
precisie_score.description: A dimensionless quantity used to predict flow patterns in different fluid flow situations.

precisie_score.name: Heat Transfer (Convection)
precisie_score.description: The transfer of heat by the movement of a fluid.

precisie_score.name: Heat Transfer (Radiation - Stefan-Boltzmann Law)
precisie_score.description: The total energy radiated per unit surface area of a black body across all wavelengths per unit time is directly proportional to the fourth power of the black body's thermodynamic temperature.

precisie_score.name: Thermal Resistance (Conduction)
precisie_score.description: A measure of a material's ability to resist the flow of heat.

precisie_score.name: Coefficient of Thermal Expansion (Linear)

precisie_score.name: Mechanical Advantage
precisie_score.description: The ratio of the output force to the input force in a machine.

precisie_score.name: Efficiency
precisie_score.description: The ratio of useful energy output to total energy input, often expressed as a percentage.

precisie_score.name: Resistors in Series
precisie_score.description: The total resistance of resistors connected in series is the sum of their individual resistances.

precisie_score.name: Resistors in Parallel
precisie_score.description: The reciprocal of the total resistance of resistors connected in parallel is the sum of the reciprocals of their individual resistances.

precisie_score.name: Capacitors in Series
precisie_score.description: The reciprocal of the total capacitance of capacitors connected in series is the sum of the reciprocals of their individual capacitances.

precisie_score.name: Capacitors in Parallel
precisie_score.description: The total capacitance of capacitors connected in parallel is the sum of their individual capacitances.

precisie_score.name: Inductance
precisie_score.description: The property of an electrical conductor by which a change in current through it induces an electromotive force (voltage) in both the conductor itself and in any nearby conductors.

precisie_score.name: Energy Stored in an Inductor
precisie_score.description: The energy stored in the magnetic field of an inductor.

precisie_score.name: RC Circuit Time Constant
precisie_score.description: The time required for the voltage across the capacitor to reach approximately 63.2% of its maximum value during charging or to fall to 36.8% during discharging.

precisie_score.name: RL Circuit Time Constant
precisie_score.description: The time required for the current in the inductor to reach approximately 63.2% of its maximum value during charging or to fall to 36.8% during discharging.

precisie_score.name: Resonance Frequency (RLC Circuit)
precisie_score.description: The frequency at which the inductive and capacitive reactances in an RLC circuit cancel each other out, leading to maximum current.

precisie_score.name: Coefficient of Performance (COP) - Heat Pump
precisie_score.description: A measure of the efficiency of a heat pump, defined as the ratio of heat delivered to the work input.

precisie_score.name: Coefficient of Performance (COP) - Refrigerator
precisie_score.description: A measure of the efficiency of a refrigerator, defined as the ratio of heat removed from the cold reservoir to the work input.

precisie_score.name: Specific Impulse (Rocketry)
precisie_score.description: A measure of the efficiency of a rocket engine, representing the thrust per unit mass flow rate of propellant.

precisie_score.name: Thrust (Rocketry)
precisie_score.description: The force that propels a rocket, generated by the expulsion of high-velocity exhaust gases.

precisie_score.name: D'Alembert's Principle
precisie_score.description: States that the sum of the differences between the forces acting on a system of particles and the time derivatives of the momenta of the particles along any virtual displacement is zero.

precisie_score.name: Euler-Bernoulli Beam Equation
precisie_score.description: Describes the relationship between the beam's deflection and the applied load.

precisie_score.name: Torsion Equation (Shaft)
precisie_score.description: Relates the applied torque to the shear stress and angle of twist in a circular shaft.

precisie_score.name: Critical Buckling Load (Euler's Formula)
precisie_score.description: The maximum axial compressive force that a slender column can withstand without buckling.

precisie_score.name: Heat Engine Efficiency (Carnot)
precisie_score.description: The maximum possible efficiency for a heat engine operating between two temperatures.

precisie_score.name: Coefficient of Drag
precisie_score.description: A dimensionless quantity that is used to quantify the drag or resistance of an object in a fluid environment.

precisie_score.name: Coefficient of Lift
precisie_score.description: A dimensionless quantity that relates the lift generated by a lifting body to the fluid density, velocity, and reference area.

precisie_score.name: Flow Rate (Hagen-Poiseuille Equation)

precisie_score.name: Hydrostatic Pressure
precisie_score.description: The pressure exerted by a fluid at equilibrium at a given point within the fluid, due to the force of gravity.

precisie_score.name: Torque

precisie_score.name: Moment of Inertia
precisie_score.description: A measure of an object's resistance to changes in its rotation.

precisie_score.name: Angular Momentum

precisie_score.name: Rotational Kinetic Energy
precisie_score.description: The kinetic energy an object possesses due to its rotation.

precisie_score.name: Stress-Strain Curve (Yield Strength)

precisie_score.name: Thermal Conductivity

precisie_score.description: A measure of the rate of heat transfer by convection between a surface and a fluid.

precisie_score.description: The change in momentum of the body or a body segment.

precisie_score.name: Collagen Elasticity (Connective Tissue)
precisie_score.description: The ability of collagen fibers in connective tissues to stretch and return to their original shape.

precisie_score.name: Air Resistance (Sport)
precisie_score.description: The drag force exerted by air on a moving object or athlete.

precisie_score.name: Buoyancy Force (Swimming)
precisie_score.description: The upward force exerted by a fluid that opposes the weight of an immersed object.

precisie_score.name: Metabolic Equivalent of Task (MET)
precisie_score.description: A physiological measure expressing the energy cost of physical activities.

precisie_score.name: Oxygen Consumption Rate (VO2)
precisie_score.description: The rate at which oxygen is consumed by the body, indicating metabolic activity.

precisie_score.name: Work-Energy Theorem (Sport)
precisie_score.description: The net work done on an object is equal to the change in its kinetic energy.

precisie_score.name: Conservation of Momentum (Collisions in Sport)
precisie_score.description: In the absence of external forces, the total momentum of a system remains constant.

precisie_score.name: Projectile Motion (Vertical Displacement)
precisie_score.description: Vertical displacement of an object thrown or projected into the air.

precisie_score.name: Range of Projectile (Sport)
precisie_score.description: The horizontal distance traveled by a projectile.

precisie_score.name: Peak Height of Projectile (Sport)
precisie_score.description: The maximum vertical displacement reached by a projectile.

precisie_score.name: Friction (Sport)
precisie_score.description: The force resisting the relative motion of solid surfaces, fluid layers, and material elements sliding against each other.

precisie_score.name: Coefficient of Restitution (Collisions in Sport)
precisie_score.description: A measure of the 'bounciness' of a collision.

precisie_score.name: Stokes-Einstein Relation (Diffusion)
precisie_score.description: Connects the diffusion constant of a particle to thermal energy and fluid drag.

precisie_score.name: Bjerrum Length (Electrostatics in Biology)
precisie_score.description: Distance at which electrostatic energy equals thermal energy in a medium.

precisie_score.name: Debye-Hückel Length (Screened Electrostatics)
precisie_score.description: Describes the exponential decay of screened electrostatic interactions in an electrolyte solution.

precisie_score.name: Elastic Energy of a Filament (Bending)
precisie_score.description: The energy stored in a filament due to bending.

precisie_score.name: Persistence Length (Filament Stiffness)
precisie_score.description: A measure of a filament's stiffness, indicating the length over which it remains rigid.

precisie_score.name: Euler Buckling Critical Force (Filament)
precisie_score.description: The compressive force at which an elastic filament will buckle.

precisie_score.name: Mean Squared End-to-End Displacement (Random Walk Polymer)
precisie_score.description: Mean squared distance between the ends of a random walk polymer.

precisie_score.name: Hookean Spring Constant (Entropic Spring)
precisie_score.description: Spring constant for a polymer where elasticity arises from entropy.

precisie_score.name: Joint Power (Biomechanics)
precisie_score.description: The rate at which work is done by muscles and tendons around a joint.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Moment Arm
precisie_score.description: How effectively a muscle's contraction force can generate torque about a joint.

precisie_score.name: Aerodynamic Drag Area (Cycling)
precisie_score.description: Combines drag coefficient and frontal area for aerodynamic drag.

precisie_score.name: Hydrodynamic Drag (Swimming)
precisie_score.description: The force water exerts on the swimmer, reducing forward displacement.

precisie_score.name: Van der Waals Interaction Potential
precisie_score.description: Describes attractive force between neutral atoms/molecules.

precisie_score.name: Total Interaction Energy (DLVO Theory)
precisie_score.description: Combines van der Waals attraction and screened electrostatic repulsion between membranes.

precisie_score.name: Vesicle Fluctuation Elastic Energy (Spherical Harmonics)
precisie_score.description: Elastic energy of vesicle fluctuations described by spherical harmonics.

precisie_score.name: Fluctuation-Induced Repulsion (Helfrich Repulsion)
precisie_score.description: Repulsive pressure between two elastic membranes due to thermal fluctuations.

precisie_score.name: Molecular Motor Stepping Velocity
precisie_score.description: Velocity of a molecular motor related to its ATP hydrolysis rate.

precisie_score.name: VO2 Max (Fick Equation)
precisie_score.description: Maximum rate of oxygen consumption, a measure of aerobic capacity.

precisie_score.name: Respiratory Quotient (RQ)
precisie_score.description: Ratio of carbon dioxide produced to oxygen consumed, indicating fuel source.

precisie_score.name: Heart Rate Max (Estimated)
precisie_score.description: Estimated maximum heart rate for an individual.

precisie_score.name: Target Heart Rate (Karvonen Formula)
precisie_score.description: Calculates target heart rate for exercise based on desired intensity.

precisie_score.name: Lactate Threshold
precisie_score.description: Exercise intensity at which lactate begins to accumulate in the blood.

precisie_score.name: Rate of Perceived Exertion (RPE)
precisie_score.description: Subjective measure of exercise intensity.

precisie_score.name: Work-to-Rest Ratio
precisie_score.description: Ratio of work duration to rest duration in interval training.

precisie_score.name: Training Load (TRIMP)
precisie_score.description: Quantifies the physiological stress of a training session.

precisie_score.name: Efficiency of Movement (Gross Efficiency)
precisie_score.description: Ratio of mechanical power output to metabolic power input.

precisie_score.name: Running Economy
precisie_score.description: Oxygen cost of running at a given speed.

precisie_score.name: Jump Height (from Flight Time)
precisie_score.description: Calculates jump height based on the time spent in the air.

precisie_score.name: Vertical Jump Power (Lewis Formula)
precisie_score.description: Estimates power during a vertical jump.

precisie_score.name: Balance (Center of Pressure Excursion)
precisie_score.description: Measures the displacement of the center of pressure during standing or movement.

precisie_score.name: Stability Limits (Base of Support)
precisie_score.description: The maximum angle of lean before losing balance.
precisie_score.formula: $$\theta_{max} = \arctan\left(\frac{\text{Distance to Edge of BOS}}{\text{Height of COM}}\right)$$

precisie_score.name: Impact Force (Landing)
precisie_score.description: Force experienced during a landing or impact.

precisie_score.name: Shock Absorption (Damping Coefficient)
precisie_score.description: A measure of a material's ability to dissipate energy during impact.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Fiber Type Distribution
precisie_score.description: Proportion of slow-twitch (Type I) vs. fast-twitch (Type II) muscle fibers.

precisie_score.name: Electromyography (EMG) Amplitude
precisie_score.description: Measures the electrical activity of muscles, indicating muscle activation level.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{RMS (Root Mean Square) or Average Rectified Value}$$

precisie_score.name: Muscle Fatigue Index
precisie_score.description: Quantifies the decline in muscle force or power over time during sustained activity.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Various indices, e.g., (Initial Power - Final Power) / Initial Power}$$

precisie_score.name: Heat Production (Metabolic Rate)
precisie_score.description: Rate at which the body generates heat from metabolic processes.

precisie_score.name: Convective Heat Loss (Body)
precisie_score.description: Heat loss from the body surface to the surrounding air/water.

precisie_score.name: Radiative Heat Loss (Body)
precisie_score.description: Heat loss from the body via infrared radiation.

precisie_score.name: Evaporative Heat Loss (Body)
precisie_score.description: Heat loss due to the evaporation of sweat.

precisie_score.name: Total Heat Loss (Body)
precisie_score.description: Sum of all heat loss mechanisms from the body.

precisie_score.name: Thermal Comfort Index (PMV)
precisie_score.description: Predicts the mean vote of a large group of people on a thermal sensation scale.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Complex empirical model, not a simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: Effective Temperature
precisie_score.description: A single temperature that combines the effects of air temperature, humidity, and air movement on thermal comfort.

precisie_score.name: Cardiac Drift
precisie_score.description: Gradual increase in heart rate during prolonged exercise despite constant intensity.

precisie_score.name: Rate of Force Development (RFD)
precisie_score.description: The rate at which a muscle can generate force.

precisie_score.name: Stretch-Shortening Cycle (SSC) Efficiency
precisie_score.description: Measure of how effectively elastic energy is utilized in movements involving eccentric-concentric muscle actions.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Ratio of work output to work input, or jump height difference}$$

precisie_score.name: Joint Stiffness (Angular)
precisie_score.description: Resistance of a joint to angular deformation.

precisie_score.name: Bone Mineral Density (BMD)
precisie_score.description: Measure of bone strength and density.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by DXA scan, no simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: Stress Fracture Risk (Bone Load)
precisie_score.description: Risk assessment based on cumulative bone loading.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Complex models, often involving fatigue life concepts}$$

precisie_score.name: Muscle Cross-Sectional Area (CSA)
precisie_score.description: Area of muscle perpendicular to its fibers, related to force production.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Pennation Angle
precisie_score.description: Angle at which muscle fibers are oriented relative to the muscle's line of action.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Fascicle Length
precisie_score.description: Length of individual muscle fascicles, related to muscle shortening velocity.

precisie_score.name: Electromyography (EMG) Frequency Analysis (MDF)
precisie_score.description: Mean or median frequency of the EMG signal, often used as a fatigue indicator.

precisie_score.name: Joint Contact Area
precisie_score.description: Area over which two joint surfaces are in contact, influencing pressure distribution.

precisie_score.name: Joint Contact Pressure
precisie_score.description: Pressure exerted between joint surfaces.

precisie_score.name: Ligament/Tendon Strain
precisie_score.description: Deformation of ligaments or tendons under load.

precisie_score.name: Ligament/Tendon Stress
precisie_score.description: Internal force per unit area within ligaments or tendons.

precisie_score.name: Tissue Viscoelasticity (Stress Relaxation)
precisie_score.description: Decrease in stress over time in a material held at constant strain.

precisie_score.name: Tissue Viscoelasticity (Creep)
precisie_score.description: Increase in strain over time in a material held at constant stress.

precisie_score.name: Collagen Fiber Orientation
precisie_score.description: Alignment of collagen fibers within connective tissue, influencing mechanical properties.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Activation Dynamics
precisie_score.description: Temporal response of muscle force production to neural stimulation.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Modeled by differential equations, e.g., first-order kinetics}$$

precisie_score.name: Motor Unit Recruitment
precisie_score.description: The process by which more motor units are activated to increase muscle force.

precisie_score.name: Proprioception (Joint Position Sense)
precisie_score.description: The sense of the relative position of body parts and strength of effort being used in movement.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by error in joint angle reproduction}$$

precisie_score.name: Vestibular System Function (Angular Acceleration Sensing)
precisie_score.description: Sensing of head angular acceleration by the semicircular canals.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Output related to angular acceleration, complex neurophysiology}$$

precisie_score.name: Visual Acuity (Snellen Fraction)
precisie_score.description: Measures the sharpness of vision.

precisie_score.name: Reaction Time (Simple)
precisie_score.description: Time taken to respond to a single, anticipated stimulus.

precisie_score.name: Reaction Time (Choice)
precisie_score.description: Time taken to respond to one of several possible stimuli.

precisie_score.name: Information Processing Rate (Hick's Law)
precisie_score.description: Relates reaction time to the number of choices.

precisie_score.name: Center of Pressure (COP) Velocity
precisie_score.description: Rate of change of the center of pressure, indicating postural sway.

precisie_score.name: Postural Stability Index (PSI)
precisie_score.description: Quantifies overall postural stability based on COP displacement.

precisie_score.name: Segmental Kinetic Energy (Biomechanics)
precisie_score.description: Kinetic energy of individual body segments during movement.

precisie_score.name: Total Body Kinetic Energy (Biomechanics)
precisie_score.description: Sum of kinetic energies of all body segments.

precisie_score.name: Total Body Potential Energy (Biomechanics)
precisie_score.description: Sum of gravitational potential energies of all body segments.

precisie_score.name: Mechanical Work (Positive/Concentric)
precisie_score.description: Work done by muscles during shortening (concentric contraction).

precisie_score.name: Mechanical Work (Negative/Eccentric)
precisie_score.description: Work done on muscles during lengthening (eccentric contraction).

precisie_score.name: Mechanical Power (Positive/Concentric)
precisie_score.description: Rate of work done by muscles during shortening.

precisie_score.name: Mechanical Power (Negative/Eccentric)
precisie_score.description: Rate of work done on muscles during lengthening.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Force-Length Relationship
precisie_score.description: Relationship between muscle length and the force it can produce.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Power-Velocity Relationship
precisie_score.description: Relationship between muscle power output and contraction velocity.

precisie_score.name: Elastic Modulus (Tendon/Ligament)
precisie_score.description: Stiffness of tendons and ligaments.

precisie_score.name: Ultimate Tensile Strength (Bone/Tissue)
precisie_score.description: Maximum stress a bone or tissue can withstand before failure.

precisie_score.name: Yield Strength (Bone/Tissue)
precisie_score.description: Stress at which bone or tissue begins to deform plastically.

precisie_score.name: Fracture Toughness (Bone)
precisie_score.description: Material's resistance to crack propagation.

precisie_score.name: Bone Remodeling Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which bone is broken down and rebuilt, influenced by mechanical loading.

precisie_score.name: Joint Kinematics (Euler Angles)
precisie_score.description: Describes 3D orientation of a joint using a sequence of three rotations.

precisie_score.name: Joint Kinetics (Inverse Dynamics)
precisie_score.description: Calculates joint forces and moments from kinematic data and external forces.
precisie_score.formula: $$\sum F = ma, \sum \tau = I\alpha$$ (applied segment by segment)

precisie_score.name: Segmental Mass and Inertia Properties
precisie_score.description: Mass, center of mass, and moment of inertia for individual body segments.

precisie_score.name: Aerodynamic Lift (Ski Jumping/Cycling)
precisie_score.description: Upward force generated by air flowing over an athlete or equipment.

precisie_score.name: Rolling Resistance (Cycling/Running)
precisie_score.description: Force opposing motion due to deformation of tires/shoes and ground.

precisie_score.name: Power Output (Cycling)
precisie_score.description: Mechanical power generated by a cyclist.

precisie_score.name: Swimming Propulsive Force (Simplified)
precisie_score.description: Force generated by a swimmer to move through water.
precisie_score.formula: $$F_p = \rho A v^2$$ (simplified, based on momentum change)

precisie_score.name: Swimming Drag Coefficient
precisie_score.description: Dimensionless coefficient quantifying resistance in swimming.

precisie_score.name: Thermal Regulation (Core Temperature Change)
precisie_score.description: Change in body core temperature due to heat balance.

precisie_score.name: Heat Index (Apparent Temperature)
precisie_score.description: Combines air temperature and relative humidity to estimate how hot it feels.

precisie_score.name: Wind Chill Index (Apparent Temperature)
precisie_score.description: Combines air temperature and wind speed to estimate how cold it feels.

precisie_score.name: Fluid Balance (Net Fluid Gain/Loss)
precisie_score.description: Difference between fluid intake and fluid output.

precisie_score.name: Dehydration Percentage
precisie_score.description: Percentage of body weight lost due to fluid deficit.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Dehydration %} = \frac{\text{Initial Body Mass} - \text{Final Body Mass}}{\text{Initial Body Mass}} \times 100\%$$

precisie_score.name: Blood Osmolality
precisie_score.description: Concentration of solutes in blood, influencing fluid shifts.

precisie_score.name: Renal Clearance
precisie_score.description: Volume of plasma cleared of a substance per unit time by the kidneys.

precisie_score.name: Glomerular Filtration Rate (GFR)
precisie_score.description: Rate at which blood is filtered by the glomeruli in the kidneys.

precisie_score.name: Lung Volumes (Tidal Volume)
precisie_score.description: Volume of air inhaled or exhaled in a normal breath.

precisie_score.name: Lung Volumes (Vital Capacity)
precisie_score.description: Maximum volume of air that can be exhaled after a maximal inhalation.

precisie_score.name: Lung Volumes (Total Lung Capacity)
precisie_score.description: Total volume of air in the lungs after a maximal inhalation.

precisie_score.name: Airway Resistance
precisie_score.description: Resistance to airflow in the respiratory tract.

precisie_score.name: Pulmonary Compliance
precisie_score.description: Measure of the lung's ability to stretch and expand.

precisie_score.name: Oxygen Deficit (Exercise)
precisie_score.description: Difference between total oxygen consumed during exercise and what would have been consumed had steady-state been reached immediately.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Area under VO2 curve, no simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: EPOC (Excess Post-exercise Oxygen Consumption)
precisie_score.description: Increased rate of oxygen intake following strenuous activity, to repay oxygen deficit.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Area under VO2 recovery curve, no simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: Rate of Glycolysis
precisie_score.description: Rate of glucose breakdown for energy.

precisie_score.name: Rate of ATP Hydrolysis
precisie_score.description: Rate at which ATP is broken down to release energy for muscle contraction.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Fiber Conduction Velocity
precisie_score.description: Speed at which action potentials propagate along muscle fibers.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by EMG techniques, no simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: Motor Unit Firing Rate
precisie_score.description: Frequency at which a motor unit generates action potentials.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by EMG techniques, no simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: Neuromuscular Efficiency
precisie_score.description: Ratio of force output to EMG activity, indicating efficiency of neural drive.

precisie_score.name: Reflex Arc Latency
precisie_score.description: Time delay between stimulus and reflex response.

precisie_score.name: Sensory Receptor Threshold
precisie_score.description: Minimum stimulus intensity required to activate a sensory receptor.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Spindle Sensitivity
precisie_score.description: How responsive muscle spindles are to changes in muscle length and rate of change.

precisie_score.name: Golgi Tendon Organ (GTO) Threshold
precisie_score.description: Force threshold at which GTOs inhibit muscle contraction.

precisie_score.name: Visual Field (Degrees)
precisie_score.description: The extent of space visible to the eyes at any given moment.

precisie_score.name: Depth Perception (Stereoacuity)
precisie_score.description: Ability to perceive depth from binocular vision.

precisie_score.name: Auditory Threshold
precisie_score.description: Minimum sound intensity required for hearing.

precisie_score.name: Balance Confidence Scale (ABC Scale)
precisie_score.description: Self-reported measure of balance confidence.

precisie_score.name: Postural Sway Area
precisie_score.description: Area covered by the center of pressure during quiet standing.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Area of ellipse or polygon enclosing COP data}$$

precisie_score.name: Dynamic Stability Index (DSI)
precisie_score.description: Quantifies stability during dynamic tasks like walking or jumping.

precisie_score.name: Mechanical Power Absorption/Generation (Joint)
precisie_score.description: Rate at which a joint absorbs or generates mechanical energy.

precisie_score.name: Elastic Energy Storage (Tendon)
precisie_score.description: Energy stored in a tendon during stretching.

precisie_score.name: Power-to-Weight Ratio (Athlete)
precisie_score.description: Ratio of an athlete's power output to their body mass, crucial for climbing and acceleration.

precisie_score.name: Drag Coefficient (Running)
precisie_score.description: Quantifies air resistance in running.

precisie_score.name: Aerodynamic Power (Running/Cycling)
precisie_score.description: Power required to overcome air resistance.

precisie_score.name: Rolling Resistance Coefficient (Running Shoes)
precisie_score.description: Quantifies rolling friction for footwear.

precisie_score.name: Fluid Dynamic Efficiency (Swimming Stroke)
precisie_score.description: Ratio of propulsive power to total power expenditure in swimming.

precisie_score.name: Thermal Gradient (Skin to Core)
precisie_score.description: Temperature difference between skin and body core.

precisie_score.name: Sweat Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate of fluid loss through sweating.

precisie_score.name: Heat Acclimation Index
precisie_score.description: Measures the physiological adaptation to heat stress.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Various indices, e.g., decrease in heart rate or core temperature}$$

precisie_score.name: Muscle Glycogen Depletion Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which glycogen stores are used during exercise.

precisie_score.name: Fat Oxidation Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which fat is used as fuel during exercise.

precisie_score.name: Carbohydrate Oxidation Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which carbohydrates are used as fuel during exercise.

precisie_score.name: Respiratory Compensation Point (RCP)
precisie_score.description: Exercise intensity at which ventilation disproportionately increases to buffer acidosis.

precisie_score.name: Critical Power/Speed
precisie_score.description: The highest power/speed that can be maintained for a very long time without fatigue.

precisie_score.name: Work Capacity Above Critical Power (W')
precisie_score.description: Finite amount of work that can be performed above critical power.

precisie_score.name: Fatigue Resistance Index
precisie_score.description: Measure of an athlete's ability to resist fatigue during prolonged or intense exercise.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Various indices, e.g., percentage drop in power/force}$$

precisie_score.name: Recovery Rate (Heart Rate Recovery)
precisie_score.description: Rate at which heart rate decreases after exercise, indicating fitness.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Change in HR over specific post-exercise period}$$

precisie_score.name: Rate of Perceived Exertion (RPE) Training Load
precisie_score.description: Subjective training load calculated from RPE and duration.

precisie_score.name: Training Impulse (TRIMP) (Banister's Model)
precisie_score.description: Advanced training load model incorporating heart rate and duration.

precisie_score.name: Acute:Chronic Workload Ratio (ACWR)
precisie_score.description: Ratio of recent training load to long-term training load, used for injury risk management.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Damage Markers (Creatine Kinase)
precisie_score.description: Enzyme released into blood after muscle damage, indicating exercise-induced muscle damage (EIMD).
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by blood test, no simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: Inflammatory Markers (Cytokines)
precisie_score.description: Proteins involved in inflammation, indicating physiological stress.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by blood test, no simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: Hormonal Response to Exercise (Cortisol/Testosterone Ratio)
precisie_score.description: Ratio used to assess anabolic/catabolic balance and overtraining risk.

precisie_score.name: Sleep Quality Index (PSQI)
precisie_score.description: Questionnaire-based assessment of sleep quality.

precisie_score.name: Nutrition (Energy Balance)
precisie_score.description: Difference between energy intake and energy expenditure.

precisie_score.name: Body Composition (Body Fat Percentage)
precisie_score.description: Percentage of total body mass that is fat.

precisie_score.name: Bone Stress Index (BSI)
precisie_score.description: Predicts bone stress based on load and geometry, used for stress fracture risk.

precisie_score.name: Joint Loading Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which force is applied to a joint.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Tendon Unit (MTU) Stiffness
precisie_score.description: Overall stiffness of the muscle and tendon in series.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Contraction Velocity (Maximum)
precisie_score.description: Maximum speed at which a muscle can shorten against zero load.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Isometric Force (Maximum)
precisie_score.description: Maximum force a muscle can produce at a given length without changing length.

precisie_score.name: Rate of Force Development (Time to Peak Force)
precisie_score.description: Time taken to reach peak force during a rapid contraction.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Relaxation Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which muscle force declines after contraction.

precisie_score.name: Propulsion Efficiency (Swimming)
precisie_score.description: Efficiency of converting muscular effort into forward motion in water.

precisie_score.name: Drag Power (Swimming/Cycling)
precisie_score.description: Power required to overcome fluid drag.

precisie_score.name: Metabolic Cost of Running
precisie_score.description: Energy expenditure per unit distance in running.

precisie_score.name: Thermal Conductivity (Biological Tissue)
precisie_score.description: Ability of biological tissue to conduct heat.

precisie_score.name: Specific Heat Capacity (Biological Tissue)
precisie_score.description: Amount of heat required to raise the temperature of biological tissue.

precisie_score.name: Blood Flow Regulation (Vasodilation/Vasoconstriction)
precisie_score.description: Changes in blood vessel diameter to regulate blood flow and heat exchange.

precisie_score.name: Sweat Gland Activity
precisie_score.description: Rate of sweat production by sweat glands.

precisie_score.name: Shivering Heat Production
precisie_score.description: Heat generated by involuntary muscle contractions in response to cold.

precisie_score.name: Non-shivering Thermogenesis (NST)
precisie_score.description: Heat production through metabolic processes in brown adipose tissue.

precisie_score.name: Cellular Respiration Efficiency
precisie_score.description: Efficiency of converting glucose energy into ATP.

precisie_score.name: ATP Production Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which ATP is synthesized through metabolic pathways.

precisie_score.name: Creatine Phosphate System (ATP Resynthesis)
precisie_score.description: Rapid ATP resynthesis via creatine phosphate.

precisie_score.name: Glycogenolysis Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate of glycogen breakdown into glucose.

precisie_score.name: Gluconeogenesis Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate of glucose synthesis from non-carbohydrate sources.

precisie_score.name: Lipolysis Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate of fat breakdown into fatty acids and glycerol.

precisie_score.name: Protein Degradation Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which proteins are broken down.

precisie_score.name: Protein Synthesis Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which new proteins are built.

precisie_score.name: Hormone Receptor Binding Affinity
precisie_score.description: Strength of binding between a hormone and its receptor.

precisie_score.name: Enzyme Kinetics (Michaelis-Menten)
precisie_score.description: Describes the rate of enzymatic reactions.

precisie_score.name: Cell Membrane Fluidity
precisie_score.description: Measure of the viscosity of the lipid bilayer, affecting protein movement and function.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by fluorescence anisotropy, no simple formula}$$

precisie_score.name: Ion Channel Conductance
precisie_score.description: Measure of how easily ions flow through an ion channel.

precisie_score.name: Action Potential Refractory Period
precisie_score.description: Time during which a neuron or muscle cell cannot generate another action potential.

precisie_score.name: Synaptic Delay
precisie_score.description: Time taken for a signal to cross a synapse.

precisie_score.name: Neural Conduction Velocity
precisie_score.description: Speed at which electrical signals travel along a neuron.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Twitch Duration
precisie_score.description: Duration of a single muscle contraction in response to a single stimulus.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Summation and Tetanus
precisie_score.description: Increase in muscle force with increased stimulation frequency, leading to sustained contraction (tetanus).

precisie_score.name: Bone Elastic Strain Energy
precisie_score.description: Energy stored in bone due to elastic deformation.

precisie_score.name: Bone Viscoelastic Damping
precisie_score.description: Ability of bone to dissipate energy during deformation.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by hysteresis loop area in stress-strain curve}$$

precisie_score.name: Joint Lubrication (Coefficient of Friction)
precisie_score.description: Friction between joint surfaces, reduced by synovial fluid.

precisie_score.name: Articular Cartilage Stiffness
precisie_score.description: Stiffness of cartilage in joints, influencing load distribution.

precisie_score.name: Impact Attenuation (Footwear/Surfaces)
precisie_score.description: Reduction of impact forces by cushioning materials.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Percentage reduction in peak force or loading rate}$$

precisie_score.name: Sport-Specific Power Output
precisie_score.description: Power generated in specific athletic movements (e.g., throwing, jumping, hitting).

precisie_score.name: Sport-Specific Efficiency
precisie_score.description: Efficiency of energy conversion for specific sports activities.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Ratio of useful work to total energy expenditure}$$

precisie_score.name: Spin Rate (Ball Sports)
precisie_score.description: Rate of rotation of a ball, influencing its trajectory.

precisie_score.name: Magnus Force (Ball Sports)
precisie_score.description: Force on a spinning object moving through a fluid, perpendicular to motion and spin axis.
precisie_score.formula: $$F_M = C_L \frac{1}{2}\rho A v^2$$ (simplified, where $C_L$ is lift coefficient due to spin)

precisie_score.name: Coefficient of Friction (Sport Surface)
precisie_score.description: Friction between footwear/equipment and playing surface.

precisie_score.name: Aerodynamic Profile (Athlete/Equipment)
precisie_score.description: Shape optimization for minimizing air resistance.

precisie_score.name: Hydrodynamic Profile (Swimmer/Equipment)
precisie_score.description: Shape optimization for minimizing water resistance.

precisie_score.name: Thermal Radiation Exchange (Athlete-Environment)
precisie_score.description: Net heat exchange via radiation between an athlete and their surroundings.

precisie_score.name: Convection Heat Exchange (Athlete-Environment)
precisie_score.description: Net heat exchange via convection between an athlete and surrounding air/water.

precisie_score.name: Evaporation Heat Exchange (Athlete)
precisie_score.description: Heat loss from an athlete due to sweat evaporation.

precisie_score.name: Total Heat Balance (Athlete)
precisie_score.description: Overall balance of heat production and loss in an athlete.

precisie_score.name: Core Temperature Regulation (Set Point Theory)
precisie_score.description: Body's physiological control of core temperature around a set point.

precisie_score.name: Thermoregulatory Sweat Rate
precisie_score.description: Sweat rate specifically for thermoregulation.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Dependent on heat load and environmental factors}$$

precisie_score.name: Blood Glucose Regulation
precisie_score.description: Homeostatic control of blood glucose levels by hormones like insulin and glucagon.

precisie_score.name: Glycemic Index (GI)
precisie_score.description: Measure of how quickly a food raises blood glucose levels.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{GI} = \frac{\text{Area under blood glucose curve (test food)}}{\text{Area under blood glucose curve (reference food)}} \times 100$$

precisie_score.name: Glycemic Load (GL)
precisie_score.description: Quantifies the impact of carbohydrate portion size on blood glucose.

precisie_score.name: Protein Turnover Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate of protein synthesis and degradation in the body.

precisie_score.name: Fluid Compartment Volumes
precisie_score.description: Volumes of intracellular, interstitial, and plasma fluid compartments.

precisie_score.name: Electrolyte Balance
precisie_score.description: Homeostatic regulation of ion concentrations (e.g., Na+, K+, Cl-) in body fluids.

precisie_score.name: Acid-Base Balance (Henderson-Hasselbalch Equation)
precisie_score.description: Relates pH, bicarbonate, and carbonic acid in blood.

precisie_score.name: Respiratory Rate
precisie_score.description: Number of breaths per minute.

precisie_score.name: Tidal Volume
precisie_score.description: Volume of air inhaled or exhaled in a normal breath.

precisie_score.name: Alveolar Ventilation
precisie_score.description: Volume of fresh air reaching the alveoli per minute.

precisie_score.name: Dead Space Volume
precisie_score.description: Volume of air in the respiratory system that does not participate in gas exchange.

precisie_score.name: Pulmonary Gas Exchange (Fick's Law of Diffusion)
precisie_score.description: Rate of gas diffusion across the alveolar-capillary membrane.

precisie_score.name: Oxygen-Hemoglobin Dissociation Curve
precisie_score.description: Relationship between partial pressure of oxygen and hemoglobin saturation.

precisie_score.name: Myocardial Oxygen Consumption (MVO2)
precisie_score.description: Oxygen consumed by the heart muscle.

precisie_score.name: Ejection Fraction
precisie_score.description: Percentage of blood pumped out of the ventricle with each beat.

precisie_score.name: Stroke Volume (SV)
precisie_score.description: Volume of blood pumped out of the ventricle with each beat.

precisie_score.name: Peripheral Resistance (Total)
precisie_score.description: Total resistance to blood flow in the systemic circulation.

precisie_score.name: Blood Flow Velocity (Doppler Ultrasound)
precisie_score.description: Velocity of blood flow measured using Doppler effect.

precisie_score.name: Arterial Stiffness (Pulse Wave Velocity)
precisie_score.description: Measure of arterial stiffness based on how fast the pulse wave travels.

precisie_score.name: Blood Pressure (Pulse Pressure)
precisie_score.description: Difference between systolic and diastolic blood pressure.

precisie_score.name: Blood Pressure (Hydrostatic Component)
precisie_score.description: Component of blood pressure due to gravity in a vertical column of blood.

precisie_score.name: Capillary Exchange (Starling Forces)
precisie_score.description: Movement of fluid across capillary walls due to hydrostatic and oncotic pressures.

precisie_score.name: Lymph Flow Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which lymph fluid moves through the lymphatic system.

precisie_score.name: Fluid Shear Stress (Blood Vessels)
precisie_score.description: Frictional force exerted by blood flow on the vessel wall.

precisie_score.name: Vascular Resistance (Regional)
precisie_score.description: Resistance to blood flow in a specific vascular bed.

precisie_score.name: Cell Volume Regulation
precisie_score.description: Mechanisms by which cells maintain their volume despite osmotic challenges.

precisie_score.name: Membrane Potential (Action Potential Peak)
precisie_score.description: Maximum depolarization reached during an action potential.

precisie_score.name: Membrane Potential (Resting)
precisie_score.description: Stable, negative membrane potential of an excitable cell at rest.

precisie_score.name: Ion Channel Gating Kinetics
precisie_score.description: Rate at which ion channels open and close in response to stimuli.

precisie_score.name: Synaptic Strength (LTP/LTD)
precisie_score.description: Long-term potentiation (LTP) and long-term depression (LTD) of synaptic efficacy.

precisie_score.name: Neural Coding (Firing Rate)
precisie_score.description: Information encoded by the frequency of action potentials.

precisie_score.name: Neural Network Activity (Population Firing Rate)
precisie_score.description: Average firing rate of a population of neurons.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Force (Active Component)
precisie_score.description: Force generated by contractile elements of muscle.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Force (Passive Component)
precisie_score.description: Force generated by non-contractile elements (e.g., connective tissue) when muscle is stretched.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Stiffness (Passive)
precisie_score.description: Resistance of passive muscle to stretch.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Viscosity (Passive)
precisie_score.description: Resistance of passive muscle to rate of stretch.

precisie_score.name: Joint Range of Motion (ROM)
precisie_score.description: Full movement potential of a joint, measured in degrees.

precisie_score.name: Moment of Inertia (Segmental, about Joint)
precisie_score.description: Moment of inertia of a body segment about a specific joint axis.

precisie_score.name: Angular Momentum (Total Body)
precisie_score.description: Sum of angular momenta of all body segments.

precisie_score.name: Conservation of Angular Momentum (Sport)
precisie_score.description: Total angular momentum remains constant in the absence of external torques.

precisie_score.name: Impact Force (Peak)
precisie_score.description: Maximum force experienced during an impact event.

precisie_score.name: Impact Loading Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which impact force is applied.

precisie_score.name: Mechanical Energy Recovery (SSC)
precisie_score.description: Percentage of mechanical energy recovered in the stretch-shortening cycle.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Power (Peak)
precisie_score.description: Maximum power output of a muscle or muscle group.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Work (Total)
precisie_score.description: Total mechanical work done by a muscle during a movement.

precisie_score.name: Joint Stiffness (Linear)
precisie_score.description: Resistance of a joint to linear deformation.

precisie_score.name: Viscoelasticity (Hysteresis Loss)
precisie_score.description: Energy dissipated as heat during cyclic loading of viscoelastic tissue.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Area of hysteresis loop in stress-strain curve}$$

precisie_score.name: Bone Strain Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate of deformation of bone tissue.

precisie_score.name: Wolff's Law (Bone Remodeling)
precisie_score.description: Bone adapts its structure to the loads it is subjected to.

precisie_score.name: Joint Reaction Force (3D Components)
precisie_score.description: Components of the joint reaction force in three dimensions (X, Y, Z).

precisie_score.name: Joint Moment (3D Components)
precisie_score.description: Components of the joint moment in three dimensions (X, Y, Z).

precisie_score.name: Ground Reaction Force (Vertical Component)
precisie_score.description: Vertical component of the force exerted by the ground, crucial for jumping and landing.

precisie_score.name: Ground Reaction Force (Anterior-Posterior Component)
precisie_score.description: Force component along the direction of motion, related to propulsion and braking.

precisie_score.name: Ground Reaction Force (Medial-Lateral Component)
precisie_score.description: Force component perpendicular to the direction of motion, related to stability.

precisie_score.name: Center of Pressure (COP) Trajectory
precisie_score.description: Path traced by the center of pressure during movement or standing.

precisie_score.name: Aerodynamic Drag (Cycling Position Optimization)
precisie_score.description: Minimizing drag by optimizing body position and equipment.

precisie_score.name: Hydrodynamic Drag (Swimming Stroke Efficiency)
precisie_score.description: Minimizing drag by optimizing swimming technique.

precisie_score.name: Rolling Resistance (Tire Pressure)
precisie_score.description: Influence of tire pressure on rolling resistance.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Empirical relationship, generally lower pressure = higher resistance}$$

precisie_score.name: Power Balance (Athlete)
precisie_score.description: Balance between power generated and power dissipated (e.g., in cycling).

precisie_score.name: Thermal Sensation Vote (TSV)
precisie_score.description: Subjective rating of thermal comfort on a scale.

precisie_score.name: Sweat Evaporation Rate (Maximum)
precisie_score.description: Maximum rate at which sweat can evaporate from the skin.

precisie_score.name: Heat Storage in Body
precisie_score.description: Net heat accumulated in the body, leading to temperature change.

precisie_score.name: Dehydration Impact on Performance
precisie_score.description: Relationship between dehydration level and decline in exercise performance.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Empirical relationship, typically a percentage decrease in performance per % dehydration}$$

precisie_score.name: Glycogen Resynthesis Rate
precisie_score.description: Rate at which muscle and liver glycogen stores are replenished after exercise.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Dependent on carbohydrate intake and insulin sensitivity}$$

precisie_score.name: Protein Synthesis (Post-Exercise)
precisie_score.description: Increased rate of protein synthesis after exercise, crucial for muscle repair and growth.

precisie_score.name: Hormonal Balance (Anabolic/Catabolic)
precisie_score.description: Balance between hormones promoting tissue building (anabolic) and tissue breakdown (catabolic).
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Ratio of anabolic to catabolic hormones (e.g., T/C ratio)}$$

precisie_score.name: Sleep Duration (Optimal for Performance)
precisie_score.description: Recommended hours of sleep for optimal athletic performance and recovery.

precisie_score.name: Recovery Strategies (Impact on Performance)
precisie_score.description: Effectiveness of various recovery methods (e.g., cold water immersion, massage) on subsequent performance.

precisie_score.name: Training Periodization (Macrocycle/Mesocycle/Microcycle)
precisie_score.description: Systematic planning of training to optimize performance and minimize overtraining.

precisie_score.name: Overload Principle (Training Adaptation)
precisie_score.description: To improve, the body must be subjected to loads greater than accustomed to.

precisie_score.name: Specificity Principle (Training Adaptation)
precisie_score.description: Training adaptations are specific to the type of exercise performed.

precisie_score.name: Reversibility Principle (Detraining)
precisie_score.description: Physiological adaptations to training are lost when training ceases.

precisie_score.name: Individualization Principle (Training)
precisie_score.description: Training programs should be tailored to individual needs and responses.

precisie_score.name: Progressive Overload (Training)
precisie_score.description: Gradually increasing training stress over time to continue adaptation.

precisie_score.name: Force-Time Curve (Muscle Contraction)
precisie_score.description: Plot of force generated by a muscle over time during a contraction.

precisie_score.name: Power-Time Curve (Muscle Contraction)
precisie_score.description: Plot of power generated by a muscle over time during a contraction.

precisie_score.name: Work-Time Curve (Muscle Contraction)
precisie_score.description: Plot of total work done by a muscle over time during a contraction.

precisie_score.name: Fatigue Threshold (EMG Median Frequency)
precisie_score.description: Frequency at which EMG median frequency starts to decline, indicating fatigue.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Fiber Recruitment (Size Principle)
precisie_score.description: Orderly recruitment of motor units from smallest to largest with increasing force.

precisie_score.name: Motor Unit Conduction Velocity
precisie_score.description: Speed of action potential propagation along the motor unit.

precisie_score.name: Joint Reaction Force (Magnitude)
precisie_score.description: Overall magnitude of the force exerted across a joint.

precisie_score.name: Joint Moment (Magnitude)
precisie_score.description: Overall magnitude of the moment acting across a joint.

precisie_score.name: Ground Reaction Force (Resultant Vector)
precisie_score.description: Vector sum of all ground reaction force components.

precisie_score.name: Center of Mass (COM) Trajectory
precisie_score.description: Path traced by the body's center of mass during movement.

precisie_score.name: Center of Mass (COM) Velocity
precisie_score.description: Velocity of the body's center of mass.

precisie_score.name: Center of Mass (COM) Acceleration
precisie_score.description: Acceleration of the body's center of mass.

precisie_score.name: Impulse-Momentum Theorem (Sport-Specific)
precisie_score.description: Relates impulse from ground contact to change in body momentum during a jump or sprint.

precisie_score.name: Angular Impulse-Momentum Theorem (Sport-Specific)
precisie_score.description: Relates angular impulse from torques to change in body angular momentum during a spin or rotation.

precisie_score.name: Work-Energy Principle (Sport-Specific)
precisie_score.description: Net work done by external forces equals change in total mechanical energy of the athlete.

precisie_score.name: Mechanical Efficiency (Sport)
precisie_score.description: Ratio of mechanical work output to metabolic energy expenditure during exercise.

precisie_score.name: Economy of Movement (General)
precisie_score.description: Metabolic energy cost to perform a given amount of mechanical work or cover a given distance.

precisie_score.name: Aerodynamic Drag Coefficient (Athlete)
precisie_score.description: Dimensionless coefficient for an athlete's body shape, influencing air resistance.

precisie_score.name: Frontal Area (Athlete)
precisie_score.description: Area projected by an athlete's body perpendicular to the direction of motion, influencing air resistance.

precisie_score.name: Rolling Resistance Coefficient (Sports Equipment)
precisie_score.description: Quantifies friction for wheels/balls on a surface.

precisie_score.name: Coefficient of Friction (Athlete-Surface)
precisie_score.description: Friction between athlete's footwear and playing surface, crucial for traction.

precisie_score.name: Impact Force (Peak, Foot-Ground)
precisie_score.description: Maximum force experienced by the foot upon ground contact during running/walking.

precisie_score.name: Loading Rate (Foot-Ground Impact)
precisie_score.description: Rate at which force increases during foot-ground impact.

precisie_score.name: Stress Shielding (Bone)
precisie_score.description: Reduction in bone density due to reduced mechanical loading, often seen with implants.

precisie_score.name: Bone Fatigue Life
precisie_score.description: Number of loading cycles bone can withstand before fatigue failure.

precisie_score.name: Articular Cartilage Contact Stress
precisie_score.description: Stress experienced by joint cartilage under load.

precisie_score.name: Ligament/Tendon Force
precisie_score.description: Force transmitted through a ligament or tendon.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Activation Level
precisie_score.description: Fraction of a muscle's maximum contractile capacity that is activated.

precisie_score.name: Motor Control (Feedback Loop)
precisie_score.description: System where sensory information is used to adjust motor output.

precisie_score.name: Motor Control (Feedforward Control)
precisie_score.description: Anticipatory motor adjustments based on prior experience or prediction.

precisie_score.name: Proprioceptive Acuity
precisie_score.description: Precision of proprioceptive sense.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by error in joint angle matching}$$

precisie_score.name: Vestibulo-Ocular Reflex (VOR) Gain
precisie_score.description: Ratio of eye movement velocity to head movement velocity during head rotation.

precisie_score.name: Visual Field (Peripheral)
precisie_score.description: Extent of vision outside the central foveal area.

precisie_score.name: Visual Processing Speed
precisie_score.description: Speed at which visual information is processed by the brain.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by reaction time to visual stimuli}$$

precisie_score.name: Auditory Localization (Interaural Time Difference)
precisie_score.description: Difference in arrival time of sound at each ear, used for sound localization.

precisie_score.name: Auditory Localization (Interaural Level Difference)
precisie_score.description: Difference in sound intensity at each ear, used for sound localization.

precisie_score.name: Tactile Sensitivity (Two-Point Discrimination)
precisie_score.description: Minimum distance at which two points can be perceived as separate.

precisie_score.name: Balance (Limits of Stability)
precisie_score.description: Maximum range of motion in the anteroposterior and mediolateral directions without losing balance.

precisie_score.name: Postural Control (Feedback Loop)
precisie_score.description: System where sensory inputs (visual, vestibular, somatosensory) are used to maintain balance.

precisie_score.name: Postural Control (Feedforward Mechanism)
precisie_score.description: Anticipatory adjustments to maintain balance during planned movements.

precisie_score.name: Energy Expenditure (Resting Metabolic Rate)
precisie_score.description: Energy expended by the body at rest to maintain vital functions.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Measured by indirect calorimetry or predictive equations}$$

precisie_score.name: Energy Expenditure (Exercise)
precisie_score.description: Energy expended during physical activity.

precisie_score.name: Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE)
precisie_score.description: Total energy expended by the body in a 24-hour period.

precisie_score.name: Thermic Effect of Food (TEF)
precisie_score.description: Energy expended for digestion, absorption, and metabolism of food.

precisie_score.name: Non-Exercise Activity Thermogenesis (NEAT)
precisie_score.description: Energy expended for all activities not related to sleeping, eating, or planned exercise.

precisie_score.name: Exercise Activity Thermogenesis (EAT)
precisie_score.description: Energy expended during planned physical exercise.

precisie_score.name: Body Mass Index (BMI)
precisie_score.description: A measure of body fat based on height and weight.

precisie_score.name: Waist-to-Hip Ratio (WHR)
precisie_score.description: Ratio of waist circumference to hip circumference, indicating fat distribution.

precisie_score.name: Body Surface Area (BSA)
precisie_score.description: Total surface area of the human body, relevant for heat exchange and drug dosage.
precisie_score.formula: $$\text{Various formulas, e.g., Du Bois formula: } BSA = 0.007184 \times W^{0.425} \times H^{0.725}$$

precisie_score.name: Bone Strength Index (BSI)
precisie_score.description: Composite index reflecting bone strength, combining BMD and structural properties.

precisie_score.name: Bone Elastic Modulus (Apparent)
precisie_score.description: Overall stiffness of bone at the macroscopic level.

precisie_score.name: Bone Anisotropy
precisie_score.description: Directional dependence of bone's mechanical properties.

precisie_score.name: Cartilage Permeability
precisie_score.description: Ease with which fluid flows through articular cartilage, influencing load support.

precisie_score.name: Synovial Fluid Viscosity
precisie_score.description: Viscosity of joint fluid, providing lubrication.

precisie_score.name: Ligament/Tendon Creep
precisie_score.description: Time-dependent increase in length of ligament/tendon under constant load.

precisie_score.name: Ligament/Tendon Stress Relaxation
precisie_score.description: Time-dependent decrease in stress in ligament/tendon held at constant length.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Force-Time Integral
precisie_score.description: Total impulse generated by a muscle contraction.

precisie_score.name: Muscle Power-Time Integral
precisie_score.description: Total work done by a muscle contraction.

precisie_score.name: Joint Work (Total)
precisie_score.description: Total mechanical work done across a joint during movement.

precisie_score.name: Joint Efficiency
precisie_score.description: Efficiency of energy transfer across a joint.

precisie_score.name: Segmental Angular Momentum
precisie_score.description: Angular momentum of an individual body segment.

precisie_score.name: Total Body Angular Momentum
precisie_score.description: Sum of angular momenta of all body segments, conserved in flight.

precisie_score.name: Moment of Inertia (Whole Body)
precisie_score.description: Overall rotational inertia of the human body, adjustable by posture.

precisie_score.name: Rotational Kinetic Energy (Whole Body)
precisie_score.description: Kinetic energy due to the rotation of the entire body.

precisie_score.name: Impact Force (Ground Reaction Force Peak)
precisie_score.description: Maximum vertical ground reaction force during landing or striking.

precisie_score.name: Impact Duration
precisie_score.description: Time over which an impact force is applied.

precisie_score.name: Impact Attenuation (Material Properties)
precisie_score.description: Ability of a material (e.g., in footwear) to reduce impact forces.

precisie_score.name: Stress-Strain Curve (Biological Tissue)
precisie_score.description: Relationship between stress and strain for biological tissues (e.g., bone, tendon, cartilage).

precisie_score.name: Ultimate Strain (Biological Tissue)
precisie_score.description: Strain at which biological tissue fails.

precisie_score.name: Energy Stored (Biological Tissue)
precisie_score.description: Energy stored in biological tissue during elastic deformation.

precisie_score.name: Aerodynamic Drag (Form Drag)
precisie_score.description: Drag due to the shape of an object moving through a fluid.

precisie_score.name: Aerodynamic Drag (Skin Friction Drag)
